Description: Lower body and conical foot sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with rosette in tondo in added white and red; exterior: trace of reserved band at junction of body and foot; outside of foot glazed streaky black, underside reserved.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0992) (phase 2)
